giterminismConfigVersion.description: Config syntax version. It should be 1 for now

cli.description: The rules of loosening giterminism for the CLI

config.description: The rules of loosening giterminism for the werf configuration file (werf.yaml)

allowUncommitted.description: Read the configuration file from the project directory despite the state in git repository and .gitignore rules

allowUncommittedTemplates.description: Read the certain configuration file templates (.werf/**/*.tmpl) from the project directory despite the state in git repository and .gitignore rules

goTemplateRendering.description: The rules for the Go-template functions

stapel.description: The rules for the stapel image

dockerfile.description: The rules for the dockerfile image

allowUncommitted.description: Read the certain dockerfiles from the project directory despite the state in git repository and .gitignore rules

allowUncommittedDockerignoreFiles.description: Read the certain .dockerignore files from the project directory despite the state in git repository and .gitignore rules

allowContextAddFiles.description: Allow the use of the certain files or directories from the project directory with contextAddFiles directive. More details

allowEnvVariables.description: Allow the use of certain environment variables (using env function). More details https://werf.io/documentation/v1.2/usage/project_configuration/giterminism.html#env

items.description: Read the certain configuration files from the project directory despite the state in git repository and .gitignore rules (using .Files.Get and .Files.Glob functions)

allowFromLatest.description: Allow the use of fromLatest directive. More details https://werf.io/documentation/v1.2/usage/project_configuration/giterminism.html#fromlatest

git.description: The rules for the git directive

mount.description: The rules for the mount directive

allowBranch.description: Allow the use of branch directive. More details https://werf.io/documentation/v1.2/usage/project_configuration/giterminism.html#branch

allowBuildDir.description: Allow the use of build_dir mount ({ from: build_dir, ... }). More details https://werf.io/documentation/v1.2/usage/project_configuration/giterminism.html#build_dir

allowFromPaths.description: Allow the use of certain fromPath mounts ({ fromPath: <path>, ... }). More details https://werf.io/documentation/v1.2/usage/project_configuration/giterminism.html#frompath
